sqls.sql: select "登録日" as registrationdate , "発生日" as accrualdate , "ステータス" as status , "分類" as classification , "タイトル" as title , cast("金額（元）" as varchar) as amountcny , cast("金額（円）" as varchar) as amountjpy , cast("為替レート" as varchar) as exchangerate , "備考" as remarks from "RES_コスト情報" where "店舗ID" = !shopid order by "発生日" desc
INSERT INTO "RES_コスト情報" VALUES ( now(), :col2, :col3, :col4, :col5, :col6, :col7, :col8, :col9, :col10, now(), now() )
delete from "RES_コスト情報" where to_char("登録日",'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')= !delKey and "店舗ID"= !shopid

select "登録日" , "発生日" , "ステータス" , "分類" , "タイトル" , "為替レート" , "備考"
from "RES_コスト情報" where to_char("登録日",'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')= !updateKey and "店舗ID"= !shopid
